option.od: print the help message and exit.
verbose. Log information to the console.

synopsis.p: Searches for a record in a rawacf file and tests if it can be processed into fitacf.

description.p: Returns zero if the record can be processed into fitacf data. Returns
Returns EOF if no record is found

example.description: This will search for a record in the 20150103.1000.02.bks.rawacf file that has an hour of 10, minute of 15, second of 45 and beam number of 8
